function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission of contagious diseases","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission in built environments","Mitigation":"Implementation of infection control measures, use of personal protective equipment, and adherence to hygiene protocols","Technologies":"Air purification systems, UV germicidal irradiation, and antimicrobial surfaces","People":"Building occupants, healthcare workers, and visitors","Owner":"Building management, healthcare facilities, and public health authorities"}]}
